text: @Mike_Pence @VP You are a failure! PRETENDING that the covid-19 virus IS GOING AWAY! We have no beds in Arizona! You suck and God is watching you and you cannot hide behind your bible and you are not only lieing to your trumpers but in God's presence! You can't repent of you are still lieing!!
